## Approach

::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}

1. Build a chronosequence of AGB by combining multiple pixel-level AGB time series
2. Develop a filtering approach to screen Landsat-derived AGB 
3. Fit non-linear mixed effects models (NLME)
